Summary Note:
Ilaria Giovanna Landi and the RM met at a networking event in Rome. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Ilaria Giovanna Landi is a 40 year old and comes from Italy.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Ilaria Giovanna Landi has been happily married to Donati since 2011. They are proud parents of 2 children: Ferrari and Francesca.
Education Background:
Ilaria received her secondary school diploma from Istituto Tecnico Industriale Alessandro Volta Torino in 2002.
Ilaria completed her university studies at Normal Superior School of Pisa in 2009.
Occupation History:
Ilaria Giovanna Landi is a seasoned professional with over 17 years of experience.
Ilaria Giovanna Landi's first role was as a Financial Advisor at Intesa Sanpaolo Private Banking, where she worked diligently from 2008 to 2010 to establish a strong reputation.
Her subsequent role was as a Portfolio Manager at Allianz Bank Financial Advisors S.p.A., where she continued to grow professionally from 2011 to 2013.
From 2015 till now, she served as a Wealth Manager at Allianz Bank Financial Advisors S.p.A., solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 160000 EUR.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Reggio Calabria and Udine, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
In 2015, she received an inheritance of 1080000 EUR from her late grandmother, who was a prominent Venture Capitalist, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in her ability to achieve financial success and security.
